backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing pricing plans, site settings, reviews, user profiles, admin authorization, and storage logic.
backend/migration.mo: Stub migration module returning a new actor state with no transformation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of humanâ€‘written summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/.env.example: Template environment configuration for frontend development and deployment.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide outlining prerequisites and steps for deploying the app to IC mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles and theming variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing the root element and script loader.
frontend/scripts/deploy-ic.sh: Shell script automating IC mainnet deployment, environment checks, and canister deployment.
frontend/scripts/verify-deploy.sh: Shell script that verifies deployed canisters, checks their running status, and confirms frontend accessibility.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component rendering the LandingPage.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: UI modal informing users they lack admin access, with different messages depending on whether admins already exist.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPanel: Main admin control panel with tabs for pricing, content, logo, and admin management.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminsAdmi: Admin management UI for listing, adding, and removing admin principals with validation and alerts.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSetup: Dialog allowing the first user to claim admin rights with success and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/LogoAdminP: Panel for viewing and updating the site logo, including file validation, preview, and upload progress.
frontend/src/components/admin/PricingPla: Admin panel for listing, creating, editing, and deleting pricing plans with form validation and modal dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteCustom: Form-based admin panel for editing site text and settings, with load, save, and error/success handling.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Footer component rendering branding, navigation links, social icons, and dynamic site settings.
frontend/src/components/landing/Header.t: Header with logo, navigation, authentication logic, admin checks, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/landing/Hero.tsx: Hero section using site settings for text and CTAs with scroll-based reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/landing/ScrollRe: Utility component that reveals its children with a fade/slide animation when scrolled into view.
frontend/src/components/landing/Sections: Defines landing page sections including stats, features, and pricing, pulling data from siteCopy and backend queries with animated cards and layout components.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Displays a mandatory setup dialog for new authenticated users to submit their name and save an initial profile.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserProf: Provides a dialog for viewing and updating an existing user profile with success and error handling.
frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts: Contains static marketing copy for navigation, hero content, stats, features, pricing, and reviews.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, exposing identity state, login, logout, and provider setup logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for admin checks, admin bootstrap, and fetching admin lists using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark theming.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app using React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the main landing page and conditionally shows the admin panel based on authentication and admin status.
frontend/src/utils/siteSettings.ts: Merges backend site settings with frontend defaults to produce final UI copy values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning hash params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for the Tripple Host website.
